metadata.title: CVE-2024-34250 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap buffer overflow vulnerability was discovered in Bytecode Alliancewasm-micro-runtime v2.0.0 which allows a remote attacker to cause at leasta denial of service via the "wasm_loader_check_br" function incore/iwasm/interpreter/wasm_loader.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-34250` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

netdata - 1.44.3-2ubuntu0.1
netdata-apache2 - 1.44.3-2ubuntu0.1
netdata-core - 1.44.3-2ubuntu0.1
netdata-plugins-bash - 1.44.3-2ubuntu0.1
netdata-plugins-python - 1.44.3-2ubuntu0.1
netdata-web - 1.44.3-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netdata package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.44.3-2ubuntu0.1').
